entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Grand Forks
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of wet flurries near noon then 30 percent chance of rain showers. Snow level rising to 1100 metres this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning. Rain beginning near noon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 6.
